subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] try the LM3820--again. [1 Attachment]
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I know it's more complicated, but have you thought of using a direct
frequency synthesis chip like the Analog Devices AD9835 or AD9850 and a PIC
or AVR microcontroller to adjust the frequency? These chips are impossible
to pull off frequency and are easily made to sweep in any manner you wish,
with the microcontroller. I've been playing with generating spread-spectrum
signals with them.

Zack
